children.subject: Office hours are 10am-5pm Monday through Friday.  They're on Zoom while class is remote but we will likely shift to either exclusively in-person office hours at our office in Eshleman 412B or a hybrid of in-person and Zoom once class returns to in-person.  The Zoom office hours link is on the website under the About Us tab.

history.content:
The Student Advocate’s Office (SAO) is a free and confidential resource students can reach out to when experiencing issues with the university. We support students navigating academic, grievance, conduct, and financial aid issues. If you are passionate about advocacy and want to make a tangible impact on students here at Cal, please consider joining our office!

Caseworkers will have the option to receive stipends in Spring 2022, and we are working to secure funds for future semesters.

If you are interested in applying, please go to advocate.berkeley.edu/apply. Below are the details for our info sessions: 

  • Info Session #1: Wednesday, January 26th at 8 PM (Zoom) 
    • Presentation on the office + Q&A Session + opportunity to talk to current caseworkers
    • Presentation portion will be recorded & uploaded to our website
  • Info Session #2: Thursday, January 27th at 9 PM (Zoom)
    • 45 minute Q&A + opportunity to talk to current caseworkers
  • Fill out this form to receive the link to our info sessions

If you have any questions about our recruitment process, please contact us at recruit@berkeleysao.org and check out our social media accounts for more information (ig @berkeleysao ; fb @ASUC Student Advocate’s Office).

And if you, or anyone you know, ever has any issues regarding the University, or wants help being connected to the right campus resources, please don't hesitate to contact us at help@berkeleysao.org or explore our website.
